data.name: Anchor Club: Extended Features - Emoji
data.detailed_description:
This DLC does not affect any of Anchor's normal functions, it simply allows you to send built-in emoji in the chat function when chatting in a multiplayer room. It does not affect creation, sharing or viewing.

Because of our hobby, we created the app "Anchor Club", and because we want to let more people know about Anchor, we decided to make the Anchor Club free.

The purchase of this DLC is more of a support to our studio and gives us more motivation to improve this platform, thank you enthusiasts.

data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1以上
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
